Pricing

DeepSeek API offers competitive pricing for our models.

Model Name Input Price ($/M tokens) Output Price ($/M tokens) Cache Price ($/M tokens)
deepseek-chat $0.14 $0.28 $0.014
deepseek-reasoner $0.55 $2.19 $0.055 (thinking: $0.55)
deepseek-v3 $0.27 $1.10 $0.027

DeepSeek-R1 Reasoning Pricing

The DeepSeek-R1 model includes additional thinking token pricing.

For reasoning models, thinking tokens are priced at $0.55/M.
